title: 252 remaining
body:
I had to reset my mac and now I'm having an issue on an imac and Macbook Pro.

The issue is the patcher gets down to the last 252MB in downloads at 83% complete and than just stops downloading. Eventually it justs stops responding. There is no issue on my network and it appears to be an issue on Riot's side.

Is there a work around or???

replies.body: 252 is the amount of exp for a dragon bone on a G altar.
I had to press up for creativity
Throw the mac out the window and buy  real PC.
